# Onis
Large, horned people that come in a variety of colors. Their accuracy with guns is terrible, but their physical strength brings them a lot of boons both in and out of combat.
## Benefits - They take 15% less Brute damage. - They do more damage in melee; 35% more Blunt and Asphyxiation, 20% more Slash and Piercing. - Due to their big size, they can easily carry and pull any other species. - Slightly more stamina than Humans.
## Drawbacks - They are too big and unwieldy, so usually they need an extra hand to use guns. If a gun already requires two hands, they are most likely unable to shoot it at all. - They are harder to carry and pull. - They are bigger than Humans, making them easier to hit.
